metadata.title: CVE-2020-28984 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: prive/formulaires/configurer_preferences.php in SPIP before 3.2.8 does not properly validate the couleur, display, display_navigation, display_outils, imessage, and spip_ecran parameters.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.8-1').
